name: Meets
0:
”Alexa, ask city meets, my city is Tempe”
”Alexa, ask city meets, search meets”
”Alexa, ask city meets, get my bookmarks”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: city meets
des:
The skill helps you find/search for meets around you based on your city, state and category. This skill is restricted to meets in USA only. The skill uses Meetup's API to find events. You can gather details of the meet and can bookmark the meet as well. Following are the steps to get started.

Say "Alexa, Open city meets"
1. set your city to Tempe for example by saying "my city is Tempe"
2. set your state to Arizona for example by saying "my state is Arizona"
3. You now need to set your category. To find list of categories among which you can choose a category, simply say "list categories".
4. Choose one category, for example 'Food and Drink' and set it by saying. "My category is Food and Drink"
5. You are all set to search your meets now. Simply say "Search meets"
6. You will get a list of 3 meets with index numbers. To get detail of a particular meet, for example meet no 1, by saying 
"detail meet 1", similarly to bookmark a meet you can say "bookmark meet 1"
7. You can get all your bookmarks by saying "get my bookmarks". You can delete all the bookmarks by saying "delete bookmarks"
8. To continue searching, say "search meets" again. Number of max results is 20.
9. You can ask to repeat the current search by saying "repeat"
 
Please Note: The skill is not developed by Meetup.com. I have just used the Meetup.com API. 

Logo Credits: http://logomakr.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
